name: ceilcl

stmt.origin: eqeltrd(cfv(cceil, c0), cz, cneg(cfv(cfl, cneg(c0))), wcel(c0, cr))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cfv(cceil, c0), cz))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(cfv(cceil, c0), cneg(cfv(cfl, cneg(c0)))))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cneg(cfv(cfl, cneg(c0))), cz))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cfv(cceil, c0), cz))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(cfv(cceil, c0), cneg(cfv(cfl, cneg(c0)))))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cneg(cfv(cfl, cneg(c0))), cz))

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(cfv(cceil, c0), cneg(cfv(cfl, cneg(c0)))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cfv(cceil, c0), cz))

comment: Closure of the ceiling function. (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 19-May-2015.)
